issue.title: [R] Bindings for str_replace_na()
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-13078](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-13078). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Implement the stringr function `str_replace_na()` which is useful in combination with `str_c()`.
